backend/main.mo: Motoko canister actor that stores one text message per user principal using a Map, with methods to add a message, retrieve a userâ€™s message, check existence, and get total message count.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report documenting implemented frontend features, mapping feature IDs and titles to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten JSON-style map summarizing the purpose of key frontend source files and components for documentation or planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark Valentine-themed UI styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page metadata, title, and mounts the React app at the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up theming, global layout, header, Valentine proposal content, footer, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright information with a heart icon and attribution link, styled for the Valentine theme.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header showing branding and Internet Identity connect/disconnect controls based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero banner component displaying a Valentine-themed image with overlay text encouraging users to share love messages.
frontend/src/components/MessageSection.t: Authenticated interaction area where users can write and submit a love message, view their saved message, and see the global message count via backend queries.
frontend/src/components/ShareSection.tsx: Reusable share card that lets users copy the current page URL or a prefilled surprise message to the clipboard with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Implements the interactive Valentine proposal UI with a teaser screen, Yes/No buttons, playful No button avoidance behavior, heart animations, and an embedded ShareSection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query-powered hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, switching between anonymous and authenticated identities and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication state, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and status helpers using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend message data (get message, message count, add message) using the ICP actor and authenticated principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines extensive CSS variables for a Valentine-themed light and dark color palette applied across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application, wrapping App with React Query and Internet Identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, custom container sizing, extended color tokens tied to CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks high-level project state, implemented features, and feature change requests for the Valentine proposal website backed by an ICP canister.
